required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Safety and Dose Response Relationship of Ulinastatin for Acute Respiratory Distress Syndrome(ARDS)
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Blind, Placebo-controlled, Parallel Group, Multi-center Study to Evaluate the Safety and Dose Response Relationship of Ulinastatin for Acute Respiratory Distress Syndrome(ARDS)

collaborator.agency: The First Affiliated Hospital of Guangzhou Medical University

brief_summary.textblock: Compared with placebo, evaluate the effects and safety of Ulinastatin(UTI) added to conventional treatment for ARDS; Evaluate the dose response relationship of Ulinastatin for ARDS.

detailed_description.textblock: After signed off the informed consent form by patient or surrogate, and after completing the screening phase, the patients who fulfill the inclusion and exclusion criteria will be randomized 1:1:1:1 to the 4 study arms. All the Patients will receive the study treatment drugs for 7 to 14 days. Use Day 28 of last patient as a cut-off day, Collect the follow up visit data on both Day 28 and Day 90 of other patients．

primary_outcome.measure: The incidence of adverse events(AEs) which can not excluded relatedness with study Product

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 0 and Day 1 to within 24h after the last treatment
Day 1 , Day 3 ,Day7 and within 24h after the last treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes of APACHEⅡ Score from baseline
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 3 ,Day7 and within 24h after the last treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes of Murray Lung Injury Score from baseline
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 3 ,Day7 and within 24h after the last treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes of Sequential Organ Failure Assessment (SOFA) score from baseline
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 3 ,Day7 and within 24h after the last treatment
Day 28 , Day 90 and Day 1 to Day 14

arm_group.description: Cohort 1- Ulinastatin 4.8 million units per day
Cohort 2- Ulinastatin 2.4 million units per day
Cohort 3- Ulinastatin 1.2 million units per day

intervention.description: Patients will receive the study drugs for 7 to 14 days
Patients will receive the placebo for 7 to 14 days

overall_official.affiliation: First Affiliated Hospital of Guangzhou Medical University

facility.name: The First Affiliated Hospital of Bengbu Medical College
Beijing Anzhen Hospital, Capital Medical University
First Affiliated Hospital of Guangzhou Medical University
The First Affiliated Hospital of Xinjiang Medical University
